website_summaries.verdict: The iterative HTC One M9 remains a physical jewel and a strong Android smartphone, but fails to take the next step.

customer_reviews.title: THE CELLPHONE DOES NOT COVER THE T MOBILES 4G LTE ...
customer_reviews.text: THE CELLPHONE DOES NOT COVER THE T MOBILES 4G LTE BANDS FOR THE USA. SO, THE DESCRIPTION OF THE DEVICE IS NOT ACCURATE. IT COVERS THE 2G AND 3G BANDS. IT IS AN INTERNATIONAL UNLOCKED PHONE, BUT IT IS NOT A T-MOBILE CELLPHONE.
customer_reviews.author: TED AN

customer_reviews.title: disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to be able to write a great review about how great the phone worked, but I cannot. It is advertised as unlocked, but when I arrived in Niger, West Africa 2 weeks ago, put in a sim card, it does not work because it asks for an 8 digit code to unlock the phone. I thought it was from the sim card here, but it works in every other phone I try. So, there is 250 bucks spent on nothing and I can't even send it back right now. Hence, I am frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: So much regret!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone ever!!!! It was advertised as new but there is no way a new phone would have so many problems! When it arrived the volume down button didn't work, but I decided it was something I could live with since I needed a phone badly. The battery seemed to drain way too fast as well. Now not even a month later and the power button is starting to not work and I'm having lots of problems with the touch screen. I can't click the q on the keyboard and it goes through phases where it randomly clicks all over the screen opening things up and changing settings. Absolutely no way this phone was new!!!
customer_reviews.author: jordan braine

customer_reviews.title: THIS PHONE ROCKS, just trash the oem charger.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is AWESOME!!!! That being said it's charger is horrible. If you do research on the phone you will find alot of problems being discussed about battery charging. My phone did the same thing with the original charger. Then I purchased a Qualcomm quick charger and cable from Amazon as well. POOF! No more problems! it is upgrade-able to Nougat 7.0 (T-MOBILE) so it still has its freshness, and is it fast. Just compare specs to one of the other flagship phones and you'll be impressed! Finally the dual stereo speakers powered by Dolby...Need I say more! so -1star for the charger. 5 for the Phone!
customer_reviews.author: BIGPOPPIE

customer_reviews.title: do not buy phones are altered and rooted major issues
customer_reviews.text: bought 2. both were rooted which means they have had their software altered.amazon keeps taking down my reivew. wha tup w that. HTC said both were showing serial numbers as activated in past. major issues w features not working, bought 2 because i thought first one was bad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked for all of 2 days then it got stuck on the T-Mobile screen and wouldn't turn off. T-Mobile said it was defective and they gave me a loaner phone with a $200 deposit. I am very disappointed! This happened the morning of my trip to Europe!

customer_reviews.title: nice little phone

customer_reviews.text: I would buy another one, I have not had problems with my phone, I'm using it right now and it is super good, the price worth it!!

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear. Poor performance.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these... I'm fairly certain this phone killed HTC. The phone feels a bit cheap despite being aluminum. The sound quality is horrendous. Screen resolution and quality stunk. The camera produced underwhelming images.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: works great looks great and more importantly i feel great !!
customer_reviews.text: so i just got my device and its in good condition pretty much brand spankin new it came sooner than expected witch was awesome because i was surviving with my last phone a few scratches (barely noticeable i might add)on the bottom where charger and head phone jack go but over all this device came in such good condition im beyond happy with it i have t mobile and had no problem getting 4g lte service, came in such good condition that i quickly ordered a case for it to keep it in great condition thanks for the awesome phone

customer_reviews.title: GPS did not work well
customer_reviews.text: Phone was fine other than the GPS. It never got a strong enough satellite signal to get a true location fix. Tried various programs, made sure location was on the highest setting, remove case and eventually even reset phone to factory settings. None of this worked. Returned phone after about six weeks and was given a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. Horst

customer_reviews.text: While the phone is fine, the charger made to plug into an electrical outlet looks like something for another country. It does not work here in the USA.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever owned! HTC replaces the phone with their own in-house protection program. I had an older "my touch" and really liked it, so that's why I stuck with HTC. They are an excellent company that stands by their products!

product_meta.title: HTC One M9 32GB Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone w/ 20MP Camera - Amber Gold
product_meta.description: Size:32 GB| Color:GoldSize:144.6 x 69.7 x 9.61 mm CPU Speed: Qualcomm Snapdragon 810, octa core; 64-bit, 4 x 2.0GHz + 4 x 1.5GHz Network: 2G/2.5G - GSM/GPRS/EDGE:850/900/1800/1900 MHz 3G UMTS: 850/900/1900/2100 MHz 4G LTE: FDD: Bands 1,3,5,7,8,20,28 TDD: Bands 38, 40, 41 Connectivity: NFC, Bluetooth 4.1,Wi-Fi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2.4 & 5 GHz), 3.5 mm stereo audio jack, micro-USB 2.0 (5-pin) port Multimedia: .aac, .amr, .ogg, .m4a, .mid, .mp3, .wav, .wma, .flac, ac3, ec3, eac3 Recording: .aac Weight: 157g Platform: Android with HTC Sense Memory: ROM: 32GB / RAM: 3GB; Extended Memory: microSD up to 2TB Main Camera3: 20MP with sapphire cover lens, auto-focus, BSI sensor, f/2.2, 27.8mm lens, 4K video recording Front camera: HTC UltraPixel, BSI sensor, f/2.0, 26.8mm lens, 1080p video recording Display: 5.0 inch, Full HD 1080p; Corning Gorilla Glass SIM card Type: nano SIM GPS: Internal GPS antenna + GLONASS Sensors: Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor, Accelerometer, Compass sensor, Gyro sensor, Sensor Hub, Magnetic sensor Battery: Capacity: 2840 mAh Talk time: Up to 25.4 hours for 2G/ 21.7 hours for 3G Standby time: Up to 391 hours for 2G/ 402 hours for 3G
feature_bullets: 20 MP camera with sapphire camera cover lens to deliver crisp clear photos
